primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To withdrawal CAD into your Ndax account on the website using your desktop, follow these steps:

  1. Click WITHDRAW at the top of the screen, or click on WALLET from the left sidebar menu.
  2. Ensure Canadian Dollar is selected and click the SEND button.
  3. Choose your withdrawal method: EFT (Direct Bank Deposit) or INTERAC E-TRANSFER.
  4. If you chose EFT, select your BANK ACCOUNT, or click ADD NEW BANK ACCOUNT if this is your first withdrawal.
  5. Type in the amount you'd like to withdraw.
  6. Read and check the box to accept the disclaimer.
  7. Click WITHDRAW.
  8. Enter the six-digit 2FA authentication code from your 2FA app.
  9. Confirm your withdrawal by clicking the link in the confirmation email.

Processing Times:

  • EFT Withdrawals: Processed twice daily on business days at 8:00 AM and 4:00 PM EST. Funds typically arrive within 1 business day, depending on your bank.
  • Interac e-Transfers: Usually received within a few minutes but may take up to 30â€“60 minutes.
